title: 820-2530 board no back light
message: Oops I meant 2 and 4, but I guess 4 will be present. VIN voltage on pin 23?

title: 820-2530 board no back light
message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 10962"]Oops I meant 2 and 4, but I guess 4 will be present. VIN voltage on pin 23?[/QUOTE]

pin2=3.2v, 4=3.1v, 23=12.6

pin 21=20 v
